item.title: 78. Subsets
item.description: LeetCode problem In this solution, we start with an empty list in the results array. For each element in the nums array, we append that element to all of the subsets in the results array to create new subsets, and then add these new subsets to the results array. By doing this for all elements in nums, we generate all possible subsets. class Solution: def subsets(self, nums: List[int]) -> List[List[int]]: res = [[]] for i in nums: for j in range(len(res)): cur = [] cur.
